title: Ariadna
description:
Ariadna is the world’s first AI talent agent that connects top creatives with leading teams and studios—no job boards, emails, or applications. Just real talk about what you need.

Ariadna helps teams find the right fit and provides creatives with insights to unlock their unfair advantage.

Got questions, suggestions, or ideas to share? Let's connect!
 Instagram @ariadna.hq 
Email hq@ariadna.ai
